page.title: 07EDUCATION IN MIDDLE BARTON
page.content: There is only one primary school in this area.The school is for children from Sandford St Martin and Middle Barton.There are five full time teachers including the head and one part time teacher.There are approximatly one hundred and fifty children in the school.There is an old school building which was built in 1866 in that building are two classrooms and a staff room.In 1959 the hall was built it was then used as a classroom.In about 1971 the hall was changed into a dining room.In the 1970's another four classrooms were built in a new block.Middle Barton school has three and a half acres.There are two hard playgrounds and the rest is grass and hedges.We have an outdoor swimming pool,sandpits.The school has a Parents Teachers Association.There are also some clubs for drama,dance and sport.
